data.meta_description: Berlins second-largest lake is perfect for all sorts of water sports. There are plenty of places to relax on the shores, and you can also hire boats or bicycles to explore the surrounding islands. The lake is easy to reach by public transport, but there are few places to buy snacks or drinks.
